question: Your company has moved to AWS so it can use

. You would like to apply version control to your infrastructure, so that you can roll back infrastructure to a previous stable version if needed. You would also like to quickly deploy testing and staging environments in multiple regions. What services should you use to achieve this?

answers.A: Opsworks, plus a version control system such as GitHub.
answers.B: Elastic BeanStalk, plus a version control system such as GitHub.
answers.C: CloudWatch, plus a version control system such as GitHub.
answers.D: CloudFormation, plus a version control system such as GitHub.
